hero.title: Botanical heat and vibrant pantry creations.
hero.intro: Creaciones Colibrí is a small-batch food studio blending tropical ingredients, bold chiles, and regenerative sourcing into sauces, snacks, and sips that nourish the body and the story behind every jar.

vision.title: Rooted in Story & Sustainability
vision.intro: From our home gardens in Florida and Costa Rica, we craft recipes that honor Central American biodiversity while respecting the land. Expect compostable packaging, fairly sourced ingredients, and a healthy dose of culinary storytelling.

categories.title: Explore Our Catalog
categories.intro: Small-batch sauces, snacks, and wellness pantry staples inspired by the biodiversity of Costa Rica and our Florida gardens.

sauces.title: Hot Sauces
sauces.description: Fruit-forward ferments, smoky classics, and adventurous regional profiles designed to layer heat with complexity.

granola.title: Granola & Crunch
granola.description: Crunchy granolas and snack clusters infused with adaptogens, tropical fruits, and garden herbs.

wellness.title: Wellness Pantry
wellness.description: Teas, spice blends, and upcycled treats that highlight functional botanicals and reduce waste.

newsletter.title: Stay in the Loop
newsletter.intro: We’re developing new recipes, gathering stories from our community partners, and preparing for launch. Drop your email to be first in line when the shop opens.
newsletter.label: Email address
newsletter.placeholder: We’re setting up our newsletter service. Until then, email us at hola@creacionescolibri.com.
